QuestData.Title: A Delicate Balance
QuestData.Description: The calling to be a Shado-pan is one to bring balance and harmony to this land. It is our duty to ensure balance is maintained, $n.$b$bThe yaungol activity in Townlong is threatening this balance and must be stopped before it is too late.$b$bWe've had sightings of yaungol in the Sumprushes. The reports indicate they are attacking the mist lurkers in the area. Find out why and put an end to it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Orbiss in the Sumprushes.
QuestData.RewardText: <Orbiss groans at you in agony.>$b$bSo, the shado-pan have sent you to see what the yaungol are doing? Well, do you see?
